description: Maps SDCRS domain roles to PGR/CCRS roles for using CCRS directly

mappings.description: Teachers report stray dog sightings as citizens
Verifiers review and verify reports like Grievance Redressal Officers
MC Officers handle field work like Last Mile Employees
MC Supervisors assign work and have GRO-level access
District Admins have read-only access for reporting
State Admins have read-only access for management

notes: These mappings allow SDCRS to use existing PGR role-based access control
Custom SDCRS roles can still be added to ACCESSCONTROL-ROLES for UI display
Workflow actions reference both PGR roles and SDCRS-specific roles
